name: 王賢達
objective: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
schedule:
1. Introduction(1 week)
2. Molecular Spectroscopy(1 week)
3. NMR(1 and 1/2 weeks)
4. MS(1 and 1/2 weeks)
5. Separation Techniques(2 weeks)
6. Elemental and Chemical Analysis(1 week)
Mid-term Exam(1 week)
7. X-ray Analysis(1 week)
8. Microscopy(1 week)
9. Image Analysis(If Time Available)
10. Surface Analysis(1 week)
11. Thermal Characterization(1 week)
12. Rheology and M.W. of Polymers(1/2 week)
13. Physical Properties of Particles and Polymers(1/2 week)
14. Applied Mechanics and Physical Testing(1/2 week)
15. Scientific Computation(1/2 week)
Final Exam(1 week)
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance(30%)
Mid-term Exam(30%)
Final Exam(40%)
materials:
A Guide to Materials Characterization and Chemical Analysis
(J.P.Sibilia, 2nd ed. Wiley-VCH)
